parameters.name: ecsInstanceIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the ECS instances.

parameters.name: ecsInstanceName
parameters.description: The name of the ECS instance.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: The tags of the ECS instance. You must configure tagKey and tagValue.
